name: Santa Clara County Crisis Line
description: Santa Clara County's 24/7 suicide and crisis hotline provides immediate support and connects callers to behavioral health services throughout the county.
fullDescription: Santa Clara County's 24/7 suicide and crisis hotline provides immediate support and connects callers to behavioral health services throughout the county.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 suicide and crisis support
- Mental health crisis intervention
- Referrals to county behavioral health services
- Support in multiple languages
- Connection to mobile crisis teams
howToGetIt: Call 855-278-4204 anytime for crisis support. For general behavioral health services, call 800-704-0900.
